data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Lead Ads to Queue/Booking Intake Flow. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Batch-level capacity concept (for example “Sourdough 7am batch = 60 loaves”)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Tries to book herself to test the flow". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
